alert.note: Alert for Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 3:34PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rapides, Beauregard, north central Calcasieu, Vernon and western Allen Parishes through 415 PM CST... At 334 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hornbeck to 6 miles west of De Ridder to near Bancroft. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Rosepine, Merryville, Anacoco, Elizabeth, Reeves, Dry Creek, Singer, Fort Polk, Sugartown, De Quincy, Slagle, Ragley, Fields, Pitkin, Mittie, Grant, New Llano and Hornbeck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
